page.title: 13The Community Council
page.content: The Community Council helps with any problems the village has like replacing litter bins,broken street lights,parking problems,blocked drains and vandalism.They give an evenings entertainment to the O.A.P.'s at Christmas and send flowers,fruit or groceries to those who are housebound.They take the children to a pantomime in Ayr as well every Christmas.They started the Man-Power Services scheme to help paint the Institute and resurface the football pitch.The Community Council also make sure that the park and the streets are kept tidy and organise the annual gala.Miss Johnstone became chairperson in 1977.Its function is to work between Nithsdale District and Dumfries and Galloway Councils on behalf of the people of Moniaive.
